cab.content: From Secretary of State for India to Viceroy, Army Department, ftth April 1920.1238. Your Foreign Department telegram of 31st March, 559 S. I confirm your proposed instructions to Malleson. He should, of course, do nothing that will make withdrawal more difficult. It is hoped that final orders wil) issue shortly on general question and on your telegram 4209 of 1st April.ti........... ..... ........military Secret. 1350
